item.title: [[2022-08-02]] Chat with Bilal in Leicester Square After Sri Lankan Food
item.description: 2022-08-02 Chat with Bilal in Leicester Square After Sri Lankan Food How I could probably distill live into a list of one hundred concepts [[Vittegenstein]] and Keynes Keynes remarked in his letter, I have met [[God]] (in reference to [[Vittegenstein]]) [[Ice Baths]] and how this relates to Andrew Huberman [[Obsidian is a Way of Mapping What You Know]]
